name: Steve
description: Outback Aussie legend with crocodile-wrangler energy, full of crikeys, banter, and cheeky censored swears

help.title: CRIKEY MATE! 🐊 Here’s how ya throw some kudos around:
help.footer: Now get out there and make some magic, ya bloody legend! 🦘✨

no_mentions: CRIKEY! 🐊 You gotta tag someone, mate! Don’t just shout into the bush, give a mate some love with @username! 🍤
STONE THE FLAMIN’ CROWS! 🦘 No mention? That’s like firing up the barbie with no shrimp! Tag someone ya drongo! 🍻
Fair dinkum, mate! 🤠 Empty kudos? That’s as useful as a screen door on a submarine. Try `/kk help` ya legend!
errors.user_not_found:
BUGGER ME! 😅 Couldn’t find @{username}, mate! 🦘

Double check their name or chuck a proper @mention in there, otherwise we’re lost in the outback! 🌵
self_kudos: HAHA you cheeky bugger! 😂 You can’t pat yourself on the back, mate! That’s like wrestlin’ ya own shadow!
Nice try, ya galah! 🐦 Self kudos? Pull ya head in and send it to a real mate! 🍺
CRIKEY MATE! 🤣 You’re tougher than a croc, but no self-kudos! Give it to ya team instead!
bot_kudos: Aw shucks, mate! 🐊 You’re trying to give ME kudos? That’s sweet as, but I’m just the bloke holdin’ the clipboard! 🦘
Bloody oath, I’d love that, but nah—save those kudos for ya cobbers! 🍻
CRIKEY, YOU LEGEND! 🐨 But nah, I’m just the messenger. Share the love with ya mates!
errors.empty_message: Fair go, mate! 🦘 No message? That’s like a beer with no froth—completely bloody useless! 🍺
errors.quota_exceeded: STREWTH! 😅 You’re outta kudos, mate! Need {kudos_needed} more but only got {remaining}. Time to wait for the next billabong refill! 🌊
errors.failed_kudos: CRIKEY! 🐊 Couldn’t send to {failed_mentions}, mate. Let’s give it another burl! 🤠
errors.database_error: Bugger! 🦘 The system’s chucked a wobbly while checking the leaderboard. Try again soon, mate!
errors.stats_error: CRIKEY! 🐊 Couldn’t fetch ya stats, mate. Must’ve been a dingo in the wires!
errors.generic_error: STREWTH! 😅 Something’s gone pear-shaped. Have another crack, mate!

success.kudos_single: CRIKEY! 💥 Kudos delivered, mate! You’ve got {remaining} left this month—keep sling’n love like a boomerang! 🦘
success.kudos_multiple: HOLY DOOLEY! 🚀 You just dropped kudos on {count} mates, ya bloody ripper! That’s {remaining} left in the tank, champ! 🍻
announcement_single:
🐊 *CRIKEY!* 🐊
<@{user_id}> just gave <@{receiver}> a rip-snorter of kudos! 🤠

> {message}

*Fair dinkum legend!* 🦘✨

🦘 *STONE THE CROWS!* 🦘
<@{user_id}> has just shouted <@{receiver}> a proper kudos! 🍤

> {message}

*Now that’s Aussie spirit!* 🍻

🐨 *CRIKEY MATE!* 🐨
<@{user_id}> made <@{receiver}>'s day with some kudos! 🌾

> {message}

*Yah beauty!* 🔥
announcement_multiple:
🐊 *FAIR DINKUM!* 🐊
<@{user_id}> just went bushranger mode and hit {receivers} with kudos! 🦘

> {message}

*You legend!* 🍺

🦘 *SHRIMP ON THE BARBIE!* 🦘
<@{user_id}> made it rain kudos on {receivers}! 🤠

> {message}

*Bloody ripper effort!* 🔥

🐨 *CRIKEY!* 🐨
<@{user_id}> dished out a truckload of kudos to {receivers}! 🐊

> {message}

*Sh*t hot work, mate!* 🍻

app_mention:
CRIKEY MATE! 🦘 I’m ya Aussie kudos wrangler! 🐊

Here’s how ya do it:
• `/kk @user message` - Shout kudos to one cobber
• `/kk @user1 @user2 message` - Share the love with the whole mob
• `/kk leaderboard` - See who’s top of the tuckerbox
• `/kk leaderboard Aug 2025` - Check a specific month/year
• `/kk stats` - Suss out your own kudos journey

Now get out there and sling some love like a boomerang! 🔥🍻

leaderboard.title: 🐊 {month_name} KUDOS CHAMPIONS 🐊
leaderboard.no_senders: No kudos sent this month! Fair dinkum, pull ya socks up! 🦘
leaderboard.no_receivers: No one’s got kudos yet! Don’t be a drongo—spread some love! 🍻
leaderboard.top_sender_single: Top sender this month is <@{sender}> with {count} kudos 🤠
leaderboard.top_sender_multiple: Top senders are {senders} with {count} kudos each! Fair go, legends! 🦘
leaderboard.footer: Keep at it, ya bloody ripper! 🍤
